channel.title: Why are my npc's facing northwest
channel.description:
for some reason all my npcs face north west.. how do i change them to face individually?? this is the basic spawn code
[code]<npc><id>6892</id><location><x>2922</x><y>3435</y><z>0</z></location></npc> Pet Shop Owner <npc><id>6893</id><location><x>2924</x><y>3435</y><z>0</z></location></npc> Pet Shop Owner Puppies [/code]

item.title: Why are my npc's facing northwest
